If the thought of eating in the middle of an interior design studio/high-end housewares and floral shop gives you pause then this place is not for you.  If not, join the interior decorator set at this very solid venue.  The service was fantastic and the food very good.  The innovative continental menu provided a great respite from all the surrounding tapas and Italian establishments.  You might even find yourself leaving with fresh flowers or some new dishes.  But, then again, I guess that is the point of this so-termed Concept Store and Restaurant.
